creator: zhaoyuz@outlook.com
text:
Created attachment 34075
the parameter I sent and it's value after urlencoded

Sent a http sample to the server with a parameter 'huioi1+312'
This parameter in the HTTP Request should be 'huioi1%2B312'
But I get this: 'huioi1 312'

There is an "Encode?" switch right to your parameter value, which you should enable, when you want to encode your parameter. If you check that switch, your problem should be solved.

If you have more problems, then ask on the users mailing list first, please. If it is really a bug, you can re-open this ticket after the discussion.
creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
